snippet.title: The Magical Mixture Mill -  Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
🎮 The Magical Mixture Mill is OUT NOW in Early Access on Steam: https://bit.ly/TheMagicalMixtureMillEA

The Magical Mixture Mill is an automated potion brewing game set in a quirky and colorful world, full of picturesque characters and surrounded by classic fantasy humor.

You’d need to build automated production lines, experiment with exotic ingredients, explore a cozy world - and try not to blow everything up.

🧪 Accessible, automated potion brewing
🍄 A Vibrant, Cozy, and Colorful world!
🧙🏻 Happy customers always come back!

🎮 JOIN THE MAGICAL MIXTURE MILL’S DISCORD:  https://discord.gg/jZUUaZkUGP  🎮
